votes.title: Votes
votes.howVotesWorkContent: If a creator has not signed up for Weknot.io yet, you can still purchases Votes for the creator which later turn in Keys when they register.
votes.howRoyaltyFeesForVotesWorkTitle: How Royalty Fees for Votes Work
votes.howRoyaltyFeesForVotesWorkContent: A total of 10% royalty fee is charged for buys and sells. 5% of the royalty fees from the trading of Votes can be claimed by the creator when they register for Weknot.io. In addition, 5% royalty fees will be held by the protocol. After 6 months, if the creator has not yet claimed the fees, Weknot will consider putting the 5% fee into community reward pool.
votes.beforeACreatorJoinsWeknotIo: Before a creator joins Weknot.io, you can trade Votes which will become a Key after they join the service
votes.yourTransactionWillBeCompletedInAFewMinu: Your transaction will be completed in a few minutes
votes.oopsYouveEnteredAnIncorrectPinNumberYouH: Oops! Youâ€™ve entered an incorrect PIN number. You have

message.noMessageTitle: You need to buy at least 1 Share to access to the private chats

invest.title: Invest
invest.profitSharingContent: Depending on how many shares you own, we offer revenue share directly to your crypto wallet based on the percentage of shares that you own.
invest.pioneerToNewFeaturesContent: We will have member-only features that you get to access first, before other normal users.
invest.votingRightsContent: We frequently update new features to weknot and you earn the right to vote whether to implement it or not.

profileWallet.earnAsPeopleTradeContent: You'll earn 5% on the trading volume whenever people buy or sell your shares.
profileWallet.earnAsYourConnectionTradeContent: You'll earn 3% on trading volume for each person you referred, buy or sell a share.
profileWallet.exportPrivateKeyTitle: Take control of your weknot.io account in two simple steps!
profileWallet.exportPrivateKeyImportContent: Import your key into other wallets such as MetaMask or Trust Wallet.
profileWallet.neverSharePrivateKey: Never share your private key with anyone! It controls your account. Note: Your private key is securely encrypted by a 3rd-party service, and we can't access it
profileWallet.setUpPINToSecureWallet: Set up PIN to secure your wallet
profileWallet.setUpPINSuccessfully: You have successfully setup PIN for your wallet
profileWallet.pinCannotAscendingorder: PIN cannot be in ascending/descending order
profileWallet.pinCannotAscendingorderEg: PIN cannot be in ascending/descending order (eg.123456,987654)
profileWallet.acknowledgeForgotPINCannotRecovered: I acknowledge that once I forgot this PIN, it cannot be recovered in any case.
profileWallet.enter6DigitsForPIN: Please enter the full 6 digits for the PIN code.
profileWallet.PINContainNumbers: The PIN must contain only numbers
profileWallet.transferBNBToAnotherWallet: You're about to transfer your BNB to another wallet. Please take a moment to double-check the destination address for accuracy before confirming on Weknot.io.
profileWallet.newPinNotOverlap: The new pin code must not overlap with the current pin code.

termsOfServices.title: Terms of Services
termsOfServices.welcomeToWeknot: Welcome to Weknot.io. By accessing and using this Website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. Please read these Terms of Service carefully.
termsOfServices.userAuthenticationAndProfileInformationC: The Website may collect user data from X (formerly Twitter) for authentication and to populate profile information. By using the Website, you consent to the collection and use of this information. Prohibited Activities:
termsOfServices.prohibitedActivitiesContent: Users must not engage in the following activities: Posting false news or engaging in deceptive practices. Attempting to cheat or engaging in any behaviour harmful to other users or society.
termsOfServices.prohibitedActivitiesSubContent: Posting harmful, explicit, or pornographic content. Spamming or exploiting the Website's vulnerabilities to gain an unfair advantage or make money.
termsOfServices.respectfulCommunicationContent: Users are expected to communicate respectfully and refrain from engaging in harassment, hate speech, or any form of discrimination.
termsOfServices.intellectualPropertyContent: Users must respect the intellectual property rights of others. Do not post content that infringes on copyrights, trademarks, or any other proprietary rights.
termsOfServices.accountSecurityContent: Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their accounts, including passwords. Notify the Website immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
termsOfServices.reportingViolationsContent: Users are encouraged to report any violations of these terms or any abusive behavior on the platform.
termsOfServices.terminationOfAccountsContent: The Website reserves the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in any activities that are deemed harmful or inappropriate.
termsOfServices.changesToTermsContent: The terms and conditions of use may be revised at any time without notice. Users are encouraged to review these terms regularly to stay informed of any changes.
termsOfServices.noGuaranteeOfContentAccuracyContent: The Website does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content posted by users. Users should exercise their own judgement when relying on user-generated content.
termsOfServices.liabilityContent: The Website shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly.
termsOfServices.governingLawContent: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law principles.
termsOfServices.governingLawSubContent: Users must respect the intellectual property rights of others. Do not post content that infringes on copyrights, trademarks, or any other proprietary rights.

privacyAndSafety.title: Privacy and Safety
privacyAndSafety.welcomeToWeknot: Welcome to Weknot.io. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you access and use our services. Please carefully read this policy to understand our practices.
privacyAndSafety.informationWeCollectContent: We may collect and store user data, including but not limited to personal information, for the purpose of authentication, analysis, and enhancement of our product.
privacyAndSafety.dataSharingContent: We do not sell or disclose your personal information to third parties, except as required by law or with your explicit consent.
privacyAndSafety.cookiesContent: We use cookies to store user authentication information. These cookies enhance your browsing experience by remembering your preferences and login details.
privacyAndSafety.securityPracticesContent: We implement reasonable security practices to protect your personal information from unauthorised access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
privacyAndSafety.securityPracticesSubContent: However, we do not guarantee the security of your information and are not liable for any loss or damage resulting from unauthorised access or other security breaches.
privacyAndSafety.changesToPrivacyPolicyContent: We reserve the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time without notice. Please review this policy regularly to stay informed of any updates.
privacyAndSafety.userResponsibilitiesContent: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including passwords. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
privacyAndSafety.notLiableForLossOrDamageTitle: Not Liable for Loss or Damage:
privacyAndSafety.notLiableForLossOrDamageContent: We are not liable for any loss or damage, whether direct or indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive, arising out of or in connection with the use of our services.
privacyAndSafety.thirdPartyLinksContent: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party sites. Please review the privacy policies of these sites before providing any personal information.:
privacyAndSafety.childrenPrivacyContent: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacyAndSafety.contactInformationContent: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [contact email]. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our services.
